title: An Act relative to access to justice

abstracts.abstract: By Representatives Day of Stoneham and Decker of Cambridge, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1635) of Michael S. Day, Marjorie C. Decker and Mindy Domb relative to interviews or questioning conducted for immigration investigations or enforcement purposes.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
